meanings.definition: A type of athletic shoe or sneaker.
meanings.sent1: I bought a new pair of reebok for my gym class.
meanings.sent2: She wore her reebok to the basketball game.
meanings.sent3: The reebok ran faster than the other shoes in the race.
meanings.sent4: His reebok were like wings on his feet, propelling him forward.
meanings.sent5: The bright red reebok stood out among the crowd of shoes.

meanings.sent1: My favorite reebok are the ones with the zigzag design.
meanings.sent2: He proudly displayed his new reebok to his friends.
meanings.sent3: The reebok seemed to have a mind of its own, hopping around the room.
meanings.sent4: Her reebok were a symbol of her dedication to fitness.
meanings.sent5: The reebok logo on the shoes gleamed in the sunlight.
